thread.title: Bader sells Columbia Heights apartment complex
thread.title_full: Bader sells Columbia Heights apartment complex

author: Hank Long
title: Bader sells Columbia Heights apartment complex
text:
Apartment Sales Tracker Home / News / Bader sells Columbia Heights apartment complex The Hart Lake Apartments at 3839 Hart Blvd. NE in Columbia Heights sold for an average of $91,724 per unit. (Staff photo: Bill Klotz) Bader sells Columbia Heights apartment complex By: Hank Long Hank Long October 9, 2015 3:16 pm 0 An entity related to St. Louis Park-based Bader Development has sold a 145-unit apartment building for age 55-plus adults in Columbia Heights for $13.3 million, according to a certificate of real estate value made public this week. The buyer is Columbia Heights-based NorthStar Properties, which recently started acquiring rental properties for older adults. The purchase instantly makes ... User Name/E-mail: Password:
